title: BSIS CA Security Guard Training
desc: The BSIS California Security Guard Training Class is a one day, eight hour training session required by the state.?The course is a mandatory step, and is composed of two main sections. The first one is Powers to Arrest, a four- hour training module designed to familiarize students on the topics of performing?legal arrest on private citizens. Our company uses the training manual mandated by the Department of Consumer Affairs?-- Power to Arrest ? ? Manual. This portion of the course includes lecture, exercises, discussion and role-playing. The next 4 hours is dedicated to Weapons of Mass Destruction (WMD) and Terrorism Awareness. This will educate students about the important subject matter, most especially about the observation skills needed to identify and report precursor activities that may lead to a terrorist activity. Registration starts at 8:30 a.m. ?The cost of the class is $60 which includes training materials, however, U.S. Veterans are FREE. This training will allow you to apply for your guard card. ?This training does not include BSIS application and live scan fees. ?However, live scan services will be provided for $70. If you have any questions, please leave your question on our webpage at www.casandsonsgroup.us.
